title: Localization: Integrate Unity Localization package
body:
Set up Unity Localization package and basic infrastructure.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Localization package installed and configured
- String Tables created (UI, Messages)
- Sample LocalizedString bound in one view
- Dev docs: how to add new keys/translations

title: Localization: Localize GameScreen UI (header, keyboard hints, toasts)
body:
Extract and localize all visible strings on the main game screen.

Scope:
- Header title text
- Toast messages ("Not enough letters", "Not in word list")
- Any inline texts in GameScreen.uxml

Acceptance Criteria:
- EN/PL translations present
- No hardcoded UI strings remain in GameScreen code/UXML

title: Localization: Localize panels (Settings, Instructions, End Game)
body:
Localize all texts in modal panels.

Scope:
- Settings panel labels and options
- Instructions content
- End Game panel (titles, messages, buttons)

Acceptance Criteria:
- EN/PL translations complete
- No hardcoded strings in UXML/USS comments or code-behind

title: Localization: Language selection in Settings (+persist & apply)
body:
Connect settings language dropdown to Unity Localization and persistence.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Changing language updates SelectedLocale
- Language saved in settings JSON
- On first launch, default to system language if supported

title: Localization: Localize runtime messages (validation errors, end-game result, share text)
body:
Move runtime strings from code into String Tables.

Scope:
- Guess validation errors
- End-game messages (win/lose)
- Future shareable result text template

Acceptance Criteria:
- All runtime messages pulled from localization tables

title: Refactor Daily Word: use remote dictionaries in Cloud Code (backend)
body:
Refactor Cloud Code to fetch daily word from remote dictionaries (e.g., CCD/Remote Config) with deterministic selection.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Cloud Code loads answers list per language/length from a remote source
- Deterministic selection preserved (dayOfYear % length)
- Graceful fallback if remote is unavailable
- Client API unchanged ({ word, date })

title: Player Statistics (local): games, wins, streak, guess distribution
body:
Track and persist player statistics locally.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Stats model & persistence service
- Update on OnGameFinished (win/lose)
- Simple stats modal (can be basic for 1.0)

title: Sound Effects and Haptics
body:
Add SFX for key actions and basic haptics.

Scope:
- Key press, submit, invalid guess (shake), flip, win/lose
- Toggle in Settings

Acceptance Criteria:
- Works on Android devices; can be disabled by user

title: Visual Themes: Light/Dark
body:
Introduce Light/Dark theme via tokens.uss or theme style sheets.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Theme toggle in Settings (Light/Dark + optional System)
- Colors and contrast verified for readability

title: Shareable Results (emoji grid)
body:
Generate an emoji grid summary and copy/share via Android intent.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Format includes mode, attempts, and emoji grid
- Share button in End Game panel

title: Minimal Analytics (UGS)
body:
Send a minimal set of analytics events for v1.0.

Events:
- app_open, game_start, guess_submit/invalid, game_finish(win/lose, attempts, word_length, lang), settings_change

title: Create App Icon and Store Graphics
body:
Prepare adaptive icon and Play Store graphics (screenshots, feature image).

Acceptance Criteria:
- Icon configured in Player Settings
- Store assets exported and documented

title: Optimize Performance and Build Size
body:
Analyze performance and build output; apply standard Unity optimizations.

Acceptance Criteria:
- IL2CPP, stripping config reviewed
- Address big allocations, reduce build size where easy wins exist
